I was browseing the content of MR4 today, looking for what the maximum number of action points were.

Either I missed it, or it wasn't there.

Since I'm at work currently (another 12-15 hour shift) I can't check what mine is now. IF I have the most I could even.

If someone can help out, that's cool. If not, I'll continue looking into it when I get home.

By Infernus on Tuesday, April 6, 2004 - 06:35 pm:

As far as I've seen, it's 10. Unless it changed when I wasn't looking...

By CHB on Tuesday, April 6, 2004 - 06:52 pm:

Ok, I knew my count was around 8, 9, or 10.

By Camet on Tuesday, April 6, 2004 - 07:09 pm:

I believe it is one for each monster you have and 1 for each level of breeder you get after lvl E (D, C, B, A, S). So it can go up and down depending on your number of monsters. The lowest possible is 1 and the highest is 10.
